projects.title: Penplotter
projects.page:
A penplotter is a 2D drawing machine that can draw shapes.I build mine for my integrated project during my last year of highschool.With building and programming the penplotter I wanted to show what I was capable of doing at that moment.

When i finnished my integrated project I could connect my computer to the machine and give in a command to draw a basic shape.The shapes my machine could draw were lines, rectangles, circles, ellipses, and circle arcs.
